author: Julian Moncada

comments.content: I can't help but feel that this face would be better off without the sheared ascenders. But that may be a matter of taste. The only thing that really looks malformed to me is C/c (the bottom half specifically). And even though your ductus is mostly horizontal, you probably won't escape the common reaction that the A is backwards.

Hola Julian,

Si, la A tiene un contraste invertido y las curvas de las esquinas en las mayusculas probablemente son innecesarias. Ojo con las proporciones de C, E, F y J.

Ya casi! Felicitaciones!

César Puertas
